tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_profiles (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name STRING,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender STRING,
  phone_number STRING,
  email STRING,
  medical_history STRING
)

CREATE TABLE patient_profiles (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patient_profiles(patient_id),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    prescription VARCHAR(200),
    appointment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    prescription TEXT,
    appointment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  doctor VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  doctor VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE telepsychiatrists (
  psychiatrist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    dob DATE,
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
    address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_history TEXT,
    medications TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    reason TEXT,
    status ENUM('Scheduled', 'Completed', 'Cancelled'),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE telepsychiatrists (
    psychiatrist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    psychiatrist_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_telepsychiatrist (
    pt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    psychiatrist_id INT,
    appointment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (psychiatrist_id) REFERENCES telepsychiatrists(psychiatrist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (appointment_id) REFERENCES appointments(appointment_id)
)
